resources: Play Instructions Menu On the display at the centre of the web there are three spiders ready to hide along the branches of the web. Pay attention to the leds lighting up: they will show the path of the spider in the same colour. When the leds turn off, it means that the spiders hid into one of the hubs. Drag the spider on the right hub and, when you\'re done, submit your answer. If you guess right where the spiders are hiding, you win. Have fun trying more difficult levels, increasing the speed of the spiders. Fill the form below with the IP address of the web in order to begin to play. Start Submit You Win! You Lose! Easy Regular Hard Difficulty Set the spiders! Set the difficulty! />
